title: Randomly Leaving Lobby + LeaverBuster
body: Anyone else experience this? I just got a leaver buster for dodging a game....but I didn't...I picked a ban, locked in my champ, noticed my adc not pick a champ so i expected to leave lobby, but then got the message saying I left and 10min leaverbuster? I've had this a few times now...

replies.body: My friend got a 30 minute one for that, it's super annoying, I guess you can't do anything about it.
